title: Why does it take more than a week for OPL to add VODS for games?
body:
So frustrating when I click on the match and get VOD not available. Doubly frustrating when LCS Vods are uploaded within a couple of hours (iirc).

Not sure if there are weird copyright laws in Australia causing this, but its pretty ridiculous.

replies.body: Yeah always makes it hard to follow games in your own region if you can't watch them live :(
